metadata.title: CVE-2018-6003 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the _asn1_decode_simple_ber function indecoding.c in GNU Libtasn1 before 4.13. Unlimited recursion in the BERdecoder leads to stack exhaustion and DoS.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6003` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtasn1-3-bin - 4.7-3ubuntu0.16.04.3
libtasn1-6 - 4.7-3ubuntu0.16.04.3
libtasn1-bin - 4.7-3ubuntu0.16.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libtasn1-6 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.7-3ubuntu0.16.04.3').
